nodes.text: Michitaka Kikuchi, working under the pen name Kia Asamiya, is a manga artist who adapted and illustrated Star Wars Manga: The Phantom Menace, an adaptation of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
Kia Asamiya work on the manga adaptation of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace was motivated by a long-standing desire to work with his favorite American characters.[source?]
